definition: loving affection (in a couple)/conjugal love
favor/grace/kindness
variant of 恩[en1]
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to make a public display of affection

sentences.english: But the Queen Mother of ruthless, and finally he just break up this pair of happy couples.
sentences.chinese: 然而王母冷酷无情，最后硬是拆散了这对恩爱夫妻。

sentences.english: And thou shalt find grace and good understanding before God and men.
sentences.chinese: 这样，你在天主和世人面前，必获得宠幸和恩爱。

sentences.english: Wish the couple be a real old Darly and Joan…
sentences.chinese: 祝愿他们俩成为一对白头偕老的恩爱夫妻。

sentences.english: However, Chapter conceal the appearance of loving feelings of emptiness and desolation of ice.
sentences.chinese: 然而恩爱的表象掩不住章冰的情感空虚和落寞。

sentences.english: Nicolas and Carla are very much in love. They want a child.
sentences.chinese: 尼古拉斯和卡拉非常恩爱，还想要个孩子。

sentences.english: The world of love, whether the dream without a trace?
sentences.chinese: 人间的恩爱，是否真如春梦了无痕？

sentences.english: Had thought them Daphnis and Chloe but they got divorced.
sentences.chinese: 人人都认为他们是恩爱夫妻，但他们却离婚了。

sentences.english: It was evidently a united and affectionate family.
sentences.chinese: 这显然是和睦恩爱的一家人。

sentences.english: I am is, sister-in-law's couple was all also affectionate, forgot this gift sons.
sentences.chinese: 我当是，弟妹两口子太过恩爱，把这礼儿都忘了。

sentences.english: "the best love song are written with a broken heart"…
sentences.chinese: 伤心最是月圆夜，万般恩爱终成空。

sentences.english: Look at these birds, do you know they fall in love with each other at first sight.
sentences.chinese: 你看那鸿雁飞过声声鸣，卿可知此鸟乃是恩爱禽。

sentences.english: It is basic assurance to have a happy life of family.
sentences.chinese: 家庭和睦，夫妻恩爱，子女孝顺是康复的基本保障。

sentences.english: They are devoted husband and wife.
They are Philemon and Baucis, a happy couple.
sentences.chinese: 他们是一对快乐恩爱的夫妻。

sentences.english: Fern loved Wilbur more than anything.
sentences.chinese: 弗恩爱威尔伯盛过一切。

definition: to make a public display of affection
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
sweet/happy
to treat each other as an honored guest (idiom)/mutual respect between husband and wife
talented man and beautiful woman/ideal couple
(coll.) (of a couple) to display affection in public or by posting photos on social media
to love each other
sweethearts/lovers
romantic love
to be well matched/to suit
husband and wife/married couple
fig. the man sings and the woman follows/fig. marital harmony
married couple very much in love/deep conjugal love
to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
love is more solid than gold (idiom)
